description:
The vampire hunter Ronaldo is hired to rescue a boy who was seen going into Castle Draluc, but the vampire waiting for him there isn`t what he expected. 
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Hunter Kitarite Sora o Tobu / Baka to Konbini to Mujou
Le chasseur vient et fend le ciel / L`idiot, la supérette et l`impermanence
The Hunter Comes and Flies in the Sky / The Idiot, the Convenience Store, and Impermanence
退治人[ハンター]来たりて空を飛ぶ / バカとコンビニと無常
